DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, gain 1 dexterity this turn only.
Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest is to match keywords like the single word keyword.

Description: Cards that can't be played again. Powers played & exhausted cards.
Cards that are in your draw & discard piles. Doesn't include played powers or exhausted cards.
Includes Attack Potion, Blessing of the Forge, Fear Potion, Fire Potion, Flex Potion, Explosive Potion & Strength Potion
Includes Skill Potion, Dexterity Potion, Fairy in a Bottle, Fruit Juice, Poison Potion, Snecko Oil & Speed Potion
Includes Block Potion, Cultist Potion, Essence of Steel, Heart of Iron, Power Potion, Liquid Memories & Swift Potion
A potion that returns a card from your discard pile to your hand & makes it cost 0 this turn.
Create a potion that adds 3 Upgraded Shivs to your hand. Upgraded Shivs are 0-cost attacks that deal 6 damage & exhaust
Create a potion that fills your potion slots with potions
Create a potion that plays your next card this turn twice
Create a potion that plays the top 3 cards of your draw pile
